EmailTemplate.description: An email to send to clients who are ready to approve a website.
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Approval Form
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Website Approval Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please see attached for your dealer approval form for the launch of your website. Please complete and return in 5 business days.
Adobe Reader is required to view this form. Get the free latest version of Adobe Reader here:
<http://www.adobe.com/go/reader>
Sign off will be required on completion of this form. Here are some instructions for your reference:
- If you would like to sign electronically, please type in your name next to your title at the end of the form. Remember to select the correct method to the left of the signature line.
- If you would like sign in ink, please print the form, sign, and fax back to my attention at 913.273.1974.
- If you would like to send an email signature, please send me an email that states you approve the website and are ready to launch after the form is completed.
Thank you for your time!
{!Project_Piece__c.OwnerFullName} {!Project_Piece__c.OwnerTitle} {!Project_Piece__c.OwnerPhone}
